code: import{useEffect}from"react";function Timer(_ref){var setTimeOut=_ref.setTimeOut,questionNumber=_ref.questionNumber,timer=_ref.timer,setTimer=_ref.setTimer,changeUsed=_ref.changeUsed;useEffect(function(){if(timer===0)return setTimeOut(true);var interval=setInterval(function(){setTimer(function(prev){return prev-1;});},1000);return function(){return clearInterval(interval);};},[timer,setTimeOut]);useEffect(function(){setTimer(30);},[questionNumber,changeUsed]);return timer;}export default Timer;
